titleStmt.title: A Romane centurion becomming a good souldier of Iesus Christ In foure sermons, preached in the cathedrall church, and in Saint Thomas Church at Sarum. By Bartholomevv Parsons, B.D. and rector of Ludgershall, in the county of Wiltes.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Bartholomew, 1574-1642.

titleStmt.title: A Romane centurion becomming a good souldier of Iesus Christ In foure sermons, preached in the cathedrall church, and in Saint Thomas Church at Sarum. By Bartholomevv Parsons, B.D. and rector of Ludgershall, in the county of Wiltes.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Bartholomew, 1574-1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M.D. and are to be sold by Henry Hammond, booke-seller in Salsbury,

notesStmt.note: STC reports variant with "sold" misspelled "sosd" in the imprint.
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1475-1640 reel 2013 lacks pages 73-80.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
